title: [Gameplay] Ghost poro provides 2 less AD than specified by the description
body: Ghost poro claims to provide 5-20 adaptive force (based on level) when placed in enemy territory, but at the start of the game (level 1-3) it only provides 3 attack damage for physical damage champion.

replies.body: It's working as intended. Adaptive stats will only give the stated amount in ap, but slightly less in ad. You realize that 1 ad is worth more than 1 ap, right? A ratio of 3 ad to 5 ap is the norm, just look at the stats the domination and sorcery tree give.
When the fudge did ghost poro do anything except sit in a bush for vision....?
